chunk:
Isntree Hyaluronic Acid Toner, 6.76 fl oz / 200ml

Brand: Isntree

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Water, propanediol, 1,2-hexanediol, sodium hyaluronate, trehalose, sodium pca, glycerin, hyaluronic acid, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, althaea rosea root extract, betula alba juice, portulaca oleracea extract, hydrolyzed sodium hyaluronate, beta-glucan, panthenol, pentylene glycol, caprylyl glycol, butylene glycol.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
